transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hanji, kaise ho Farukh ji?
Customer: Bas badhiya, aap bataiye.
Executive: Bahut badhiya ji, bahut badhiya. Kahan pe ghar pe ho ya office mein ho?
Customer: Abhi to ghar pe hi hun ji.
Executive: Achcha, ye bataiye aapka concern aaya tha, parso aapka concern aaya tha, wo kya concern tha aapka, ye bataiye mujhe ek baar.
Customer: Ye jo hai meri meri samajh mein nahi aayi baat, us din ladke ne bola tha. Wo ye keh raha tha ke jo lead vagera hai wo do do din purani nazar aa rahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Yani ke jab hame pata chale lead ka ke lead hai to wo jo hai nahi tab tak us pe 10-12 call ho chuke ho aur ye wo ho jae, late ho jao.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Is tarah hamare paas lead aa rahi. Ji.
Executive: Okay, okay, ye tha. Ha, theek hai wo bol rahe honge aisa ladke ne check kiya hoga ki jo lead aa rahi hai wo pehle aa rahi hai usse pehle usko call ho jati hogi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To isme kya hota hai, koi bhi customer hai jab wo lead dalta hai usne upload kar di apni requirement ki mujhe chahiye itne pieces sofa, itne pieces bed, wo requirement ban gayi, lead ban gayi. Right? Ab koi bhi buylead hoti hai jo wo jaise bed ki aayi to bed ke jitne bhi seller honge unko wo buylead dikhegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Un sabko wo buylead dikhegi but us lead pe jo kaam kar sakte hain na wo sirf paanch hi seller kaam kar sakte hain. Paanch se jyada nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Paancho ne agar us lead pe kaam kar liya, paancho logo ne usse baat kar li fir wo sold out ho jati hai fir wo use hi nahi kar sakta fir chhata insan use nahi kar sakta. Jo matlab jo hum lead mil rahi na hame wo purani mil rahi hui hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hai na? Jaise hi kisi ne inquiry dali wo turant hame show honi chahiye na wo cheez hai.
Executive: Right, uske liye kya karna padega sir? Uske liye account pe active rehna padega, jo buylead ka section ho us pe.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan, ab let's suppose sir, abhi mere paas lead aayi wo hamare account pe aur usko main sham ko khol ke dekh raha hun to mujhe 8 ghante purani dikhegi na sham ko to. To usme mere ko kya karna padega, subah din mein sham ko ek baar check kar le ki kaun si lead aayi hai. Agar subah achchi lead aayi hai to subah sir 5 minute khol ke check kar liya, din mein kar liya, sham ko kar liya. To isse kya hoga buylead agar aayi hai to 4 ghante ke andar agar hum buylead ko use karte hain usme conversion achcha aata hai sir. Kyunki 4 ghante ke andar wo fresh lead hai. Right usme hum price bhi de sakte hain sari cheez hai sir. Wo cheez hai. Baki isme ek aur cheez hai sir jo main dekh pa raha hun yahan pe hamare jo product hai abhi ek product add hua tha sir jiska ye tha solid wood door.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Is pe deal kar rahe hain sir solid wood door pe hum?
Customer: Haan haan haan. Total residential furniture mein kuch bhi ho.
Executive: Achcha, okay. Kyunki solid wood door hai na uski buylead humne consume ki hai sir aur wo jo category hai. Hamara concern ye hai ke wooden matlab residential furniture mein kuch bhi ho aur uske sath sath wo wooden ka ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Plywood ka engineer wood ka na ho. Ye cheez hai.
Executive: Achcha plywood ka na ho?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay, okay. Aur marble pe hum deal karte hain, teak wood pe deal karte hain. Marble top ha marble top dining ka hum bana denge koi se bhi mil jayega. Haan wo dining ka marble ka ho jata hai sir apna. Right ab ye cheez bataiye ye jo solid wood door hai sir solid wood door mein ye teak wood double door hai ye solid wood door ke andar hi aata hai kya? Isko bol sakte hain kya?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Achcha ye solid wood door ke andar aata hai sir ha. Ek minute ruk jaaiye solid wood door isko add kar deta hun sir. Wood door ek minute sir ye yahan pe add nahi tha ye solid wood door yahan se maine isko kar diya sir. Iske alawa sir ye antique royal sofa hai jo?
Customer: Ye bhi ye bhi chalega.
Executive: Ye sir isme material kaun sa hai sir isme antique royal sofa hai isme material kaun sa laga hua hai sir? Antique jo hota hai wo hota hai polish ke sath hai na aur jo material usme use hota hai wood hi hota hai. Antique ho gaya designer ek tarike se old design ka sofa chahiye unko hai na old design mein jo hai carving wale designer sofa jo hai wo hamare hi paas hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achcha okay to wo sir basically hamara jo hota hai wo wooden ke alawa sir aur kisi material ka bhi banta hai ya khali hamara wooden ka hi banega wo hamare paas?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jo antique mangega wo wooden ka hi mangega generally. Achcha. Generally wooden ka hi hota hai. hote hain bahut kam chance hote hain jo antique mangega to wo ya to iron ka hoga ya fir ka aur 99% wooden ke hi lete hain. Iron vagera koi jo casting vagera pe hue hue hote hain wo to bahut kam lete hain wo to park vagera ke liye hota hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Warna jo hai wooden ka hi mangte hain ha.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay theek hai sir aur ye luxury carved sofa set ye bhi basically wooden ka hi milta hoga.
Customer: Ye bhi wooden ka hi rehta hai.
Executive: Okay aur apna jo ye rehta hai sir jaise aapne bataya marble ka jo hai hamara dining set banta hai.
Customer: Haan dining ka dining table pe top lagta hai marble ka.
Executive: Achcha achcha okay. Leg aur sari wood hi rehti hai top top marble ka hota hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Marble ka hi hota hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir ye main kar deta hun sir apne se baki jo bachcha hai sir jab usne inquiry dali thi to sir mujhe ye bata dijiye unse na ek baar main baat bhi kar lunga basically apne end mein. Jisme ye problem to main nahi samajh ki jo aapne bola iske alawa aur koi problem bhi agar unko aayegi to main guide dunga. Right to unse kis time jyada jyada active wahi rehta hai. Dusra banda. Achcha achcha. Mera kaam sirf ye hai ke wo lead uthayega fir uske baad customer se baat karke usko lead ko close karne ki koshish meri rehti hai. Exactly exactly matlab entertain aap karte ho sir. Haan primary interaction wo kar leta hai. Baad mein fir agar usse handle nahi ho raha to main dekhta hun. Achcha okay ye to kafi achchi baat hai sir kyunki hamari wo to hum bechte hi hain entertainment karna aapki jimmedari sir. Right ki customer ko entertain kaise karna hai ab entertain quality pe karna hai price pe karna hai location pe karna hai wo sir aap better tarike se jante ho humse. Bilkul right sir aur buylead hai jo sir buylead mein to kami chodenge hi nahi koshish karenge whatsapp pe bhi aapko buylead main send kar do jo achchi buylead hai sir aur koshish kya karo bas bache ko itna guide kar dena ki jo buylead hai na jab buylead use kar rahe hain ek to recent ka filter laga le dusra 4 ghante ke andar ab sir ek cheez batao din mein sir ek baar agar India mart khol ke dekhenge to purani buylead dikhegi sir uske liye kya karna padega subah sham din mein mein ek ek baar jab bhi time lag raha hai teen char ghante baad 5 minute deni padegi account pe sir right tab wo kar payenge sir aise yahi solution hai uska baki kya hoga main baat kar lunga unka number kaun sa hai sir ye bata do mujhe. Hamare profile pe do number hai ek to yahi wala hai ek dusra hoga 960 wala hai 960 wala. Theek hai theek hai theek hai ek baar sir unse na connect kar leta hun apne end se theek hai sir. Theek theek hai theek hai chalo sir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are appearing old, 2-3 days old.

- Wants leads to be shown immediately after inquiry.

- Wants leads for solid wood doors only.



Resolution:

- Explained how buyleads are distributed to sellers.

- Advised to stay active on the account.

- Advised to check the account multiple times a day.

- Executive will connect with the customer's colleague.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with the customer's colleague.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, solid wood door, marble dining set, antique sofa
